fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Fortify a player each night, attacking one random visitor of your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a 30% chance to grant your target no defense, 30% chance to grant your target Basic defense, 20% chance to grant your target Powerful defense and 20% chance to grant your target Invincible defense.
- You have a 30% chance to deal no attack, 30% chance to deal a Basic attack, 20% chance to deal a Powerful attack and 20% chance to deal an Invincible attack.
